bio: im roif from indonesia im translator crowdin artikel in web and blog
contributionDescription:
I want to contribute in the field of translators, so far I have translated various optimism articles both on the web, blogs and crowdin
that way I hope to help people, especially Indonesians who want to join the optimism ecosystem so that in the future optimism can have more members from various countries that make optimism can continue to grow and be global.

contributionLinks.description: I posted my translation on my medium page
I have also translated on crowdin optimism.

pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for violating rule 1, as it promises future deliverables in forms of translations and increasing members from various countries.
